rooms.description: Open-plan living and kitchen area designed in a Bohemian style with vibrant color accents and artisanal decor.
Integrated bathroom for ground floor usage, incorporating natural textures and Vastu compliant water element placement.

openings.description: Large entrance with decorative elements following Vastu principles to welcome positive energy.
Strategically placed windows ensuring natural light and ventilation as per local norms.

rooms.description: Luxurious 1BHK bedroom designed with Bohemian aesthetics, incorporating warm textures and sustainable materials.
Built-in closet adjacent to the bedroom, optimizing space utilization.

openings.description: Small private balcony with Vastu compliant positioning for relaxation and fresh air.
Large window ensuring ample daylight in accordance with local regulations.

rooms.description: A flexible studio space that can serve as a guest room or hobby area, blending Bohemian decor and functional design.
Additional storage area integrated into the triplex layout.

openings.description: Window in the staircase for improved ventilation and adherence to safety standards.
